plot outline: Rohan Jhadav is a boxing champion he has to please his coach to devote time for his game he is in love with Vishaka.When Vishaka is forcefully being married to someone else Rohan elopes with her hoping help from his uncle who backs out. Rohan still struggles and first few months are put for test as he is financially not stable.When Vishaka is pregnant he becomes tense on how he will manage everything where he finds moral support in Vishaka's aunt and his friend Tapshya.The night Vishaka is rushed to hospital for delivery another couple arrive on the same time businessman Sujit and his wife pregnant wife Vishaka gives birth to twins and Anjali suffers miscarriage.Sujit then puts a condition to Rohan which he can't deny.
title: Dubhang
plot: Rohan a training boxer elopes with his girlfriend and gets married they give birth two twins where i a childless businessman Sujit puts an offer to Rohan which he cant refuse.
